Reviews.Title: Read this product description VERY carefully!
Reviews.Author: Ghenghis
Reviews.Content: (OK, when I posted this review, there was one seller, now there are over 50 on thispage ostensibly selling "white" iPhones. Advice: Ask questions.)This phone from Alpha 1 Sales appears to be a refurb, not new. Check these details.# Version 4.2 or most recent version# Fully "restored", includes all original applications# "Original" packaging# All "new" earbuds, USB Cable, and AC AdapterApple does not advertise original packaging, or fully restored products with new accessories.Also this Amazon listing includes a photo of a white "conversion kit." Not cool. Also you needto check the customer feedback, there are complaints about used phones being passed off as new.Amazon needs to do a better job of policing these type listings, especially since they areproviding the fulfillment services. Bad form. BTW, 5 stars for the iPhone 4, but I would neverpay this kind of money for a used refurb.

Reviews.Title: It was "locked"
Reviews.Author: Samir
Reviews.Content: The iphone 4 was advertised as "unlocked (Never Lock)" but in fact it was locked !!!It was purchased to use outside the USA. Thankfully a vendor was found to unlock it, but it takes some special maneuvering when starting it to get around the lock.Other than that, it works perfect.

Reviews.Title: Apple IPhone 4 unlocked (never lock)
Reviews.Author: Sundar
Reviews.Content: Hi, This is bad as per the add and the statement or title - stating unlocked (never lock). This phone requries Gevey SIM to use and requires a couple of steps each time I start the phone or power off and on back. Although the steps are simple and straight forward but cannot complete or successful in 1 or 2 attemps. Sometime you need to go 4 or 5 times redo the steps. Time to detect and enable the phone to use also very long. you also have to enable the data roaming option on all the time and this consume the battery - last you 1 day only. Be carefull as this is actually an AT&T; locked phone and use Gevey SIM to unlock.Other than that, the phone is new and good.Sundar

Reviews.Title: "Great Device, Terrible Phone"
Reviews.Author: Unknown
Reviews.Content: Pros: The mulitmedia software, camera, battery, screen, sturdy buildCons: Phone reception, carrier and alleged build defect, "multitasking"Summary: I think this is an amazing device. The OS is leaps and bounds better than any other phone currently on the market. The problem and hence the poor rating is that as a phone it's simply terrible. I switched carriers and have owned this product for a couple months now. Bottom line it drops an UNUSUAL amount of calls. I can understand the occasional droped call, but it's constant. Where do I live you ask? Austin TX, a major city where I do believe ATT is the no.1 carrier. That being said, in my opinion there is certainly a defect in the phone and perhaps even network problems with ATT. But I know many people with the 3G & 3G S models, who do not have the drop call issues. So it must be the phone. Yes I do have a case on it, it helped some, but still have a lot of dropped calls. If they fix this issue, which I am sure they are working for the next model already, I would easily give this a much better rating.

Reviews.Author: Vepsey Rivas
Reviews.Content: My brother loves his new gift. Thanks a lot. Plus the details it said about the phone were exactly right. Again thanks.

Reviews.Title: WARNING - Phone IS NOT UNLOCKED
Reviews.Author: Emerson
Reviews.Content: The phone sold as "never locked", in fact is a LOCKED phone and impossible to use outside the USA or in another carrier.

Reviews.Title: iphone 4
Reviews.Author: ttina639
Reviews.Content: the outside of the phone was in almost perfect condition..no scratches or cracks to the screen.. BUT!!!!the merchant failed to mention the volume button (up) was not working, the filter/screen right next to the front camera is broken..ANDthey did not clean the phone at all before shipping it. Still had dirt in between the groves.Just saying, if I'm selling a product, I want to make sure I give all the information to the buyer and clean the product.. you don't want to pass on your germs.

Reviews.Title: Nala loves it
Reviews.Author: Linda L
Reviews.Content: Nala loves the phone but she has to send it back. She can't conect it to Straight-Talk ,because she purchased it from Amazon,Not from Straight-Talk. She is very disappointed! She has to save more money because they want $400.00 instead of $279.00. Very upset with Walmart for telling her she could. Thank You Linda L.

Reviews.Title: Solid Performance
Reviews.Author: Chan
Reviews.Content: The iPhone is a solid performer with a worry-free attitude.  It may be manufactured in china but the quality of the phone surpasses any smartphone in its current class.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This phone is awesome! I really like the phone it's in great condition. It's fully functional n no problems with phone.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Sis
Reviews.Content: Love the phone! Only paid $198 and it was in like brand new condition. I'm in love with it. It even came with an otterbox. Very nice, and fast.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: stella patterson
Reviews.Content: I like the phone.  I am a neophyte so it's difficult to use.  I am disappointed that it does not work in my home. our wifi is not strong.

Reviews.Title: iphone 4
Reviews.Author: daifmt
Reviews.Content: Hello .... Please return your iPhone 4 you have purchased from you because it contains a SIM card and return the money you paid

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: It was there as scheduled, it is working properly and the sender sent me an email to check if everything wqs all right. You can do busines with him.

Reviews.Title: IPhone vs. Android (Take Android  ---> you would love it)
Reviews.Author: Laraf
Reviews.Content: I played with an iPHone from here and it was awful.  I found iPhone to have a dumb interface, locked everywhere, less option, and certainly a horrible integration of necessary apps like Gmail, cloud docs (Google docs)...etc  I am going back to Android.  Ice-cream Sandwich OS or Gingerbread are the real deal.  Processors on higher-end Androids are much much faster."ProcessorThe Samsung Galaxy S2 boasts a 1.2GHz dual-core ARM Cortex-A9 processor that provides really fast performance without any delay. Web browsing is very quick even via Wi-Fi networks, and you won't face any problem with loading and playing even the most "heavy" games on Samsung's flagship.The iPhone 4S has a 1GHz dual-core ARM Cortex-A9 processor, which is also very fast (much faster than the single-core processor of the original iPhone 4 at least), but, though it provides great graphical acceleration, it yields to the CPU of the Galaxy S2 in terms of performance, so here the winner is Samsung's smartphone."Source: [...]

Reviews.Title: after reading all the comments and in the same time complaints from my niece who just got one i decided not to buy one even if i
Reviews.Author: leon
Reviews.Content: so many dissatisfied customers , including my niece i changed my mind t o upgrade and own one even if it,s fre

Reviews.Title: Completely disappointed
Reviews.Author: Dalton.Dulier
Reviews.Content: I expected to get a  16BG IPhone 4 in very good condition. I got the exact opposite! It's in terrible condition! COMPLETELY cracked on the back, scratches ALL over the phone, and the home button works half the time. And i paid $300 for it. I want my money back, or an Iphone that isn't completely screwed up.

Reviews.Title: Most are probably stolen
Reviews.Author: KP
Reviews.Content: Buy these phones at your own risk!  Mine was recently stolen.  It has been locked remotely and cannot be activated.  Screen savers that make it look like the phone is turned on can be purchased at Walmart.  Any buyer will most likely get a phone that cannot even be used.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4s ... sucks
Reviews.Author: M. Palomares "Investment Genius"
Reviews.Content: It has mic and headset issues that come up about every other day... wtf!Other than that it's great... but if your planning on making calls often.. make sure to get warranty if your keeping it for years

Reviews.Title: bad tech support
Reviews.Author: rossco
Reviews.Content: I have an Iphone 4 which I purchased in July.  I called Apple today because thier update bricked my phone.  Well I'm out of the 90 day tech support warrenty so I can buy Apple Care(nice name, "Apple cares about $") for a year$69 or a one time call for $29.  FU Apple.  Apple is an arrogant company, that cares little for the customer.  I bought into the hype you dont have too.  My wife loves her droid.

Reviews.Title: it isnt very good. Bad phone.
Reviews.Author: M. TERMINI GUCCIONE
Reviews.Content: Bad phone, it is not very good status, and i dont have the box of the product, and the accesories too, its a bad seller

Reviews.Title: GET IT !!
Reviews.Author: spawn
Reviews.Content: paid for a 16g and got a 32g awesome surprise!! looks really original like out of the factory.  very satisfied with this purchase
